Package it.polimi.ingsw.event.modelviewevent

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AmmoTileUpdateEvent
    it represent an Ammo Tile replacement on the Map
    AmmoUpdateEvent
    this class handle the update of the ammo that a player, identified by the character, has got
    EndGameUpdate
    This Event update the match end
    KillShotTrackUpdateEvent
    represent a GameTrack Update, when a player is killed
    ModelViewBroadcastEvent
    Is the abstract class for the broadcast Model to View update
    NewPlayerJoinedUpdateEvent
    When a new client enter the match and chose the character, is shown to all the other connected clients
    PlayerBoardUpdateEvent
    represent the PlayerBoard Update after a damage, a mark or a death
    PlayerDisconnectionNotify
    Message to notify the disconnection of a player to other clients
    PlayerPositionUpdateEvent
    represent the updatePlayer updated Position
    PlayerPowerUpUpdateEvent
    Message to handle the change of the player's powerUps
    PlayerReconnectionNotify
    Message to handle the player reconnection
    PlayerWeaponUpdateEvent
    Message to handle the update of the player's weapon
    PositionUpdateEvent
    Message to handle a generic position update
    ReconnectionMapUpdate
    Message to send all the information about the map to a reconnected player
    ReconnectionSettingsEvent
    Message to send all information about the game to a player who reconnected to print it again on his client
    WeaponUpdateEvent
    Message to notify the change of the weapon on a spawn square
